NO APPOINTMENT NECESSARY.   Each guest is allowed one visit every 30 days and is asked to provide proper identification that states their current home address. Each guest must bring their I.D., a utility bill (electric, water, or gas), or a lease agreement.   There are three Harvest Compassion Center locations.
